main event: A civilian man reported seeing a 'flying saucer' that was spinning and throwing off blue-white sparks in New Orleans on August 3, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as spinning and traveling at approximately 100 mph., The observer was sunbathing when he noticed the object., Sparks emitted from the object gave it a shimmering appearance., The object appeared to be about 2 yards in diameter., There was considerable discussion among witnesses about the unusual nature of the sighting.
sighted object: a spinning flying saucer emitting sparks
witness description: A clerk-typist working for Army Finance.
